mapper.select: SELECT pid, cat, layerDef, optionDef, uidx, name, bflag FROM tb_preset WHERE cat = #{cat} AND bflag=true
SELECT pid, cat, uidx, name, bflag FROM tb_preset WHERE cat = #{cat} AND bflag=true
SELECT pid, cat, layerDef, optionDef, uidx, name FROM tb_preset WHERE pid = #{pid}
SELECT cat FROM tb_preset WHERE pid = #{pid}

SELECT tp.pid, tp.cat, tp.uidx, tp.name, tqc.support FROM tb_preset tp left join tb_qa_category tqc on tp.cat = tqc.cid WHERE uidx = #{uidx}
SELECT pid, cat, name, tb_qa_category.title as "title", tb_qa_category.support FROM tb_preset, tb_qa_category WHERE uidx = #{uidx} AND tb_preset.cat = tb_qa_category.cid
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_preset ( cat, layerDef, optionDef, uidx, name, bflag ) VALUES ( #{cat}, #{layerDef}::jsonb, #{optionDef}::jsonb, #{uidx}, #{name}, #{bflag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE public.tb_preset SET cat=#{cat}, optiondef=#{optionDef}::jsonb, layerdef=#{layerDef}::jsonb, name=#{name} WHERE pid=#{pid} AND uidx=#{uidx}
